column4: use the absolute path to the file or first go to directory where it is
I created a folder media and moved the iso file to it... how should I edit the command sudo mount -o loop -t iso9660 /media/ubuntu-7.04-desktop-amd64.iso mountpoint   ?
a newbie here.. I dunno what am doing
put the iso on your desktop, mkdir /media/mount, and then cd ~/Desktop and then mount -o loop isofile /media/mount
